definition: "roof" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 40), occurring in 家, 定, 安 etc/see also 寶蓋|宝盖[bao3 gai4]
"piece of wood" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 90), mirror image of 片[pian4]
classifier for strips of land or bamboo, shops, factories etc/slit bamboo or chopped wood (dialect)
not yet/did not/have not/not/8th earthly branch: 1-3 p.m., 6th solar month (7th July-6th August), year of the Sheep/ancient Chinese compass point: 210°
to yearn for sth even in one's dreams (idiom)/to long for sth day and night
to doze/to take a nap/nodding off to sleep
to rise early and sleep late (idiom); to work hard/to study diligently/to burn the candle at both ends
lit. awake or asleep/at any time
Mei, dinosaur genus/Mei long, dinosaur species

sentences.english: The while speaking clear Mei has already trod on knife light, the powder natural and unrestrainedly rises to midair.
sentences.chinese: 說話間明寐已經踏上劍光，粉瀟灑的升到半空中。

sentences.english: But she is sometimes can't sleep, night difficult sleep.
sentences.chinese: 只是她有時是睡不着，夜難寐的。

definition: lit. awake or asleep/at any time
late at night/in the dead of night
